participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and resilient, Alex has a passion for music and enjoys connecting with others through art.
participant_1.background: I was once bullied so badly online that I had to delete all of my social media accounts. My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music. My favorite drink is caramel cappuccino. My master's degree is in Italian literature. I work for a clothes retailer.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and artistic, Jordan finds solace in nature and music, often using them as outlets for his emotions.
participant_2.background: I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well. I wish my mom was healthier. I need a home with a large music room for my guitars and a space to display my pointe shoes. I work part time in the campus library. I love to work in my garden.

content.text: I'm just working in the garden. It's a beautiful day out.
That sounds relaxing. I'm practicing music for my band.
Cool! What kind of band are you in?
We're a rock band. We play covers of popular songs.
That sounds fun. I love to play music too. I play classical guitar.
Nice! I used to play classical guitar when I was younger.
I got really busy with school and work.
I can understand that. I'm glad you're still playing music though.
Thanks. I'm glad you're still playing too.
Me too. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I agree. It's also a great way to connect with other people.
It definitely is. I've made a lot of friends through music.
Me too. I'm glad we're both music lovers.
Me too. We should jam sometime.
That would be fun! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
